metadata.name: Successful Account Login Via WMI
metadata.comment: Detects successful logon attempts performed with WMI

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 4624 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmiprvse.exe')))

output.summary: Detects successful logon attempts performed with WMI

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Monitoring tools 2. Legitimate system administration Reference: Internal Research
